availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Martha Lydia Johnson (Scott County, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Scott County, Kentucky, resident. Scott County native. Daughter of George W. Johnson and Ann Viley Johnson. Resident of Scott County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, District No. 1, p. 115. "Succumbed to Typhoid," Courier-Journal (Louisville, Ky.), August 21, 1896, p. 4. Find A Grave, "Martha Lydia Johnson Payne (1845-1896)," Memorial #99037338, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/99037338/martha-lydia-payne (accessed January 16, 2018).
